{{Extra album cover
  | Upper caption = Alternative cover Type = Single Cover = TheDecision2006.jpg
  | Lower caption = 2006 re-issue cover
}} }} "'The Decision'" was the first single from English indie rock band Young
Knives and is featured on their debut album, [[Voices of Animals and Men]]. It
was originally released on 21 November 2005 and did not chart. However, the re-
issue released on 30 October 2006 reached a peak position of #60 in the UK
Singles Chart.
